## Plot [ Views / Temporals ]

```{r echo=TRUE, fig.height=6, fig.width=12, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, fig.align='center', class.source='fold-hide', out.width="100%"}

theme_opts <- theme(
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#162033",
                                size = 2, linetype = "solid"),
    plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#162033"), 
    plot.title = element_text(color = "white", size = 12, face = "bold"),
    plot.subtitle = element_text(color = "white", size = 8),
    plot.caption = element_text(color = "#555555", size = 8),
    axis.title.x = element_blank(),
    axis.title.y = element_blank(),
    axis.text.x = element_text(color="white", size=8),
    axis.text.y = element_text(color="white", size=8),
    panel.border = element_blank(),
    panel.grid.major.y = element_line(color = '#81858c', linetype = "dotted"),
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank(), # remove minor gridlines
    panel.grid.major.x = element_blank(), # remove x gridlines
    legend.title = element_blank(), # remove legend title
    legend.text = element_text(color = "black", size = 8),
    legend.position="top",
    legend.background = element_rect(fill="white")
  )



# Create a color palette
colors <- c("CIVIL WAR" = "#fc9003","GENOCIDE" = "#fc0380", "WAR" = "#03a5fc")

# Plot
v1 <- df_cleaned %>%
      mutate(Conflict.Deaths = fct_reorder(Conflict.Deaths, Deaths)) %>% 
      ggplot(aes(x = Start.Year, y = Conflict.Deaths)) + 
      geom_segment(aes(xend = End.Year, yend = Conflict.Deaths, color = Type.Of.Conflict, position = "identity")
                   , size = 4) +
      geom_point_interactive(aes(tooltip = paste0("Deaths: ", format(round(as.numeric(Deaths), 1), big.mark=",")), 
                                 data_id = Conflict.Deaths, x = 1850, size = Deaths, 
                                 fill = Type.Of.Conflict, color = Type.Of.Conflict), 
                             stroke = 1,shape = 21)+
      scale_x_continuous(breaks=c(1880,1920,1960,2000)) +
      scale_fill_manual(values = colors) +
      scale_colour_manual(values = colors) +
      labs( title = "CONFLICTS OF THE WORLD", subtitle = "TIMELINE OF CONFLICTS")+
      theme_bw() +
      theme_opts+
      # Don't show the legend of the points
      scale_size(guide=FALSE, range = c(0.5,3.5))

girafe(ggobj = v1, width_svg = 13, height_svg = 7,
       options = list(opts_sizing(rescale = TRUE, width = 1.0)))

```
